name: Stand Tall
description:
After prospering for centuries, Rinca City became the biggest and most important trade port. Thanks to its reputation, the city attracts people from across the world, all in search of money, fame, and glory. However, because of this reputation, the city caught the attention of the Demon Kind. Be prepared to fight and defend your city!

Even though weak in appearance, the army of the Demon King does not draw its strength from the power of its soldiers but from their resilience and unbreakable will. Coming back over and over again, they will put your endurance and strength to the test. Get ready to fight and stand strong against them in order to protect Rinca’s doors!

Even though the fiends have an endless army, you will also have assets in your ranks. Three trustworthy companions by the name of Jacob, Franz, and Nicolaus will help you in your quest to defend the city. Upgrade their skills, sharpen yours, and get ready to stand tall in front of your city’s doors!
